name: The House of Hallways
description:
You have stumbled upon a beautiful mansion. It is seemingly uninhabited, but strangely in the middle of nowhere. Just out of curiosity (and the strangely humbling welcome sign), you step inside. However, you find that there is more than dust and cobwebs lurking in the halls. There is only one rule, stay alive and don’t let the ghouls of The House of Hallways get you.

Classic Top-Down Shooter that you can play on the go. With 28 levels over 7 floors, be careful not to get in over your head. Pick up crates for ammo and health, or use your power-ups to give you a bit of a boost to fight back or run for it.

Can you make it to the Big Door? Or will you be swallowed by the ghouls that dwell in The House of Hallways?
